directions: Mix strawberries and sugar together in a bowl until evenly coated. Refrigerate until strawberries are thawed, 8 hours to overnight.
Place a slice of angel food cake on each plate; top with whipped topping and sweetened strawberries.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
title: Super-Easy Strawberry Shortcake
